introduction.title: Welcome to 양재 정육 식당
introduction.content: 양재 정육 식당 is an F&B service brand built on professional beef butchery. We curate premium Korean beef, prepare every cut with care, and serve a refined dining experience. We also offer tailored menus for events and corporate clients.

brand.title: Dining shaped by butchery expertise
brand.subtitle: Expert cut selection and chef-driven preparation come together for unforgettable beef flavor.
brand.journeyContent1: Built on years of beef sourcing and distribution experience, 양재 정육 식당 manages every step from origin to aging, trimming, and cooking.
brand.journeyContent2: We guide guests to the right cuts and ideal doneness so every meal highlights the true character of premium beef.

chefs.title: Butcher & chef collaboration
chefs.description: Butchery experts and chefs co-create each menu.

love.title: Warm hospitality
love.description: Attentive service ensures a comfortable dining experience.

quality.title: Premium beef
quality.description: Only top-grade Korean beef from trusted partners.
